content.title: Christmas
content.description: Join us on a prayer journey throughout the lent season.

image1.alt: Three friends hanging out and walking together in the city.

content.text1: Beginning March 2, we'll be praying through the Lent season, right into Good Friday and Easter. We'll have more information next week, including a link to register for digital access, for a printed guide if that's something you'd like, or even for a whole kit for a hands-on experience.

button1.description: Click to register to receive resources for month of prayer.
